mapper.insert: insert into orderdb (orderID, orderType, carID, goodsName, goodsWeight, postPName, postAddr, getPAddr, orderState, postPTel, getPName, getPTel, StateCity, midCity, endCity, shipPrice, deliveryPrice, transportPrice, totalPrice, Car, COMMENT ) values (#{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsweight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{postptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{getptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{deliveryprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{car,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update orderdb set orderType = #{ordertype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, carID = #{carid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goodsName = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, goodsWeight = #{goodsweight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, postPName = #{postpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, postAddr = #{postaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPAddr = #{getpaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, orderState = #{orderstate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, postPTel = #{postptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPName = #{getpname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, getPTel = #{getptel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, StateCity = #{statecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midCity = #{midcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endCity = #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shipPrice = #{shipprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, deliveryPrice = #{deliveryprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, transportPrice = #{transportprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, totalPrice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Car = #{car,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where orderID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select orderID, orderType, carID, goodsName, goodsWeight, postPName, postAddr, getPAddr, orderState, postPTel, getPName, getPTel, StateCity, midCity, endCity, shipPrice, deliveryPrice, transportPrice, totalPrice, Car, COMMENT from orderdb where orderID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select orderID, orderType, carID, goodsName, goodsWeight, postPName, postAddr, getPAddr, orderState, postPTel, getPName, getPTel, StateCity, midCity, endCity, shipPrice, deliveryPrice, transportPrice, totalPrice, Car, COMMENT from orderdb
